snippet.title: Underhanded tactics guaranteed to land a bigger bonus
snippet.description: Greg Miliates offers some tips -- some underhanded -- for getting a bigger bonus.

snippet.title: Android tabs hurt my head
snippet.description: The official way of handling tabs in Android now relies on "a trick." William Francis makes the case for why he demonstrates the "old" way of doing tabs.

snippet.title: Beware of crazy recruiter tricks
snippet.description: One CEO has his receptionist check out the state of a job candidate's car as a means of gauging his or her "character." Read about this and other crazy interviewer ploys.
